executable.title: FiberViewer Light
executable.description: Light Version of FiberViewer. Used for Fiber Clustering thanks to methods such as Length, Gravity, Hausdorff, or Mean Distribution and Normalized Cut.
executable.contributor: Jean-Baptiste Berger, Clement Vachet, Martin Styner

boolean.name: nogui
boolean.description: If this option is used, you will use the command line, DEFAULT=false
boolean.label: nogui

boolean.name: use_danielsson_transform
boolean.description: If this option is used, computation will use Danielsson Transformation to calculate distances
boolean.label: use_danielsson_transform

string-vector.name: process_list
string-vector.description: List of methods that will be computed and which distance tables will be saved
string-vector.label: List of processes used for computation

integer-vector.name: voxels_size
integer-vector.description: Describe the image size for the Danielsson Transformation in voxels (X,Y,Z)
integer-vector.label: Image size in voxels
